BARBARA, PANGASINAN LAST NOVEMBER 28, 2007 AT THE MUNICIPAL CONFERENCE ROOM, FOR THE PURCHASE OF GENERAL MERCHANDISE (AS PER REQUISITES OF IRR OF RA 9184.[rc][nl][rc][nl]PRESENT:[rc][nl][rc][nl]Mr. Albertini S. de Guzman[tab][tab]-[tab]Chairman[rc][nl]Miss Patrocenio C. Fernandez[tab][tab]-[tab]Member, BAC Secretariat[tab][tab][tab][rc][nl]ABSENT:  N O N E[rc][nl][rc][nl]RESOLUTION NO. 260-P[rc][nl]Series of 2007[rc][nl][rc][nl]?RESOLUTION IMPLEMENTING GUIDELINES, PROCEDURES, REQUIREMENTS AND POLICIES OF THE IRR OF RA 9184 FOR LGU ON PURCHASE OF  GENERAL MERCHANDISE TO POST AT THE G-EPS AS PER COA GUIDELINES/INSTRUCTIONS.?[rc][nl][rc][nl]WHEREAS, the Municipality of Sta. Barbara, as a Local Government Unit, and under RA 9184 and its Implementing Rules and Regulations for Procurement of all Office Supplies, Medicines and Medical Supplies, Construction Supplies etc;[rc][nl][rc][nl]WHEREAS, the Commission on Audit is the implementing body of the government, the Municipality of Sta. Barbara is obliged to follow and adopt the IRR of RA 9184;[rc][nl][rc][nl]WHEREAS, the Commission on Audit instructed the BAC Chairman and Members to post all procurement transactions by the Municipality to the G-EPS, as per guidelines/instructions before the procurement transaction be done;[rc][nl][rc][nl]WHEREAS, the Local  Chief Executive, Department Heads and BAC Members, unanimously approved the implementation of IRR of RA 9184;[rc][nl][rc][nl]IT WAS RESOLVED AS IT IS HEREBY RESOLVED, that all procurement transactions by the Municipality of Sta. Barbara, Pangasinan, be posted at the G-EPS for proper information and guidelines and copies of this resolution be furnished all government concerned for immediate action and approval.[rc][nl]?Unanimously Approved.?[rc][nl][tab][rc][nl][tab][tab][tab][tab]Certified True and Correct:[rc][nl][rc][nl][tab][tab][tab][tab][tab]       SGD.
